QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: GridAngle
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Angle for parallel lines of grid.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: FlyAlternateTransects
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Fly every other transect in each pass.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: SplitConcavePolygons
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Split mission concave polygons into separate regular, convex polygons.
QGC.MetaData.Facts.comment: Although this setting is here, the code for it is disabled since it was not working.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: ActuatorValOn
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Normalized value when Sprayer is ON.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: ActuatorValOff
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Normalized value when Sprayer is OFF.
